channel.title: Documentation on The Gardening Bunny
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on The Gardening Bunny

item.title: Perennials
item.description: Perennial plants are a fascinating category in the botanical world, known for their ability to live for more than two years, often regrowing season after season from the same roots.

item.title: Annuals
item.description: Annual plants are a vibrant and integral part of the botanical world, known for completing their entire life cycle within a single growing season.
